title: Xerath or Zac
body: Been playing xerath on rotation and I find him really fun but I was going to buy Zac even though I haven't tried him because I already have a lot of mid laners, also I doubt Zac is going to be on rotation any time soon. Can I have your recommendations please? Thank you

replies.body: I play Zac as my go to jungler. He has good clear amazing ganks (if your laner has damage) and heaps of sustain
Zac every day of the week.
Zac is heaps of fun. I even take him top lane every now and then good times :^)
